w/ friends A collection of games you can play with friends.

Filters w/ friends

A bunch of AR filters.

the collection

Encanto, Bruno!

We don't talk about Bruno! But you can sing along as him...

Cocomelon ABC

Sing along and learn the alphabet!

Cocomelon Colors

Learn some colors while painting your hair.

Filipino Birthday

Maligayang Kaarawan! Watch a lechon roast by birthday candle.

McDonald's Drive-Thru

Enjoy some McDonald's favorites in the car.

Potty Training

Dance on the toilet.

Games for fun.
